name: Last Horizon
description: A minimal space exploration and survival game. Pilot the last vessel of a fallen civilization into the vast unknown, in search of a new world to call home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz CPU Memory: 500 MB RAM Storage: 80 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Thank you to the devs for sending me this game! First off I would like to say I like the concept and art style. The music is very calming and the concept is very intuitive. The gameplay is fairly good, but I could not seem to figure out how to properly land the ship without making it go on fire... which made this game very difficult. Would be more fun and easier if there was a better way to land (unless I missed something). 6/10

A simple and perfect mix of exploration and atmospher

It's cute, it's minimalistic, it's simple, and it's fun. Also lonely.  Also really, really difficult...or perhaps I just suck.   Anyway, just another cool game from a group of cool people that make cool games.   It also has an awesome ambient soundtrack.   It's easily worth the money. You've spent five bucks on stuff you've enjoyed far less.
Very polished and pretty fully featured for such a minimilist game, especially considering the price. This game is simple, but It has a high replay value. Easily worth twice the price
